name: Womboto Roboto
description:
Womboto Roboto

Your furry cat companions have been stolen by evil monsters and now you must assemble a team of robotic friends to help you along your way to getting them back!

Explore the world to find allies and defeat enemies in unique turn-based combat. Type character combinations to use your abilities. Type them faster to add to your combo meter for even more potent attacks and abilities!
